title: DHS Pudukkottai Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 16 Multi Purpose Worker and Other Posts
description: The District Health Society (DHS Pudukkottai) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 16 Audilogists, Security Guards, Multi-Purpose Health Workers, Lab Technicians, and Other Jobs. Those candidates who have completed their B.Sc, M.Sc, 08th Pass, Diploma, DMLT can grab this chance and apply for the DHS Pudukkottai Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply fo...
